players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Charlie's death is tragic. We need to share info carefully. I'm a villager. Who else can claim a role?"
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. Bob is confirmed town."
Bob: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Diana instead of me or Charlie? That seems odd for Night 1."
You: "I investigated Diana because I suspected her from the start. Bob, your questioning makes no sense - why defend the mafioso?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
